    Time depend ROC and AUC

    Source: R/Survival.R
    surv_ROC_DCA.Rd

    Time depend ROC and AUC

    surv_ROC_DCA(risk = NULL, event = NULL, time = NULL, timePoint = 12)

    Arguments

    timePoint

    Examples

    data(mayo, package = "survivalROC")
#> Error in find.package(package, lib.loc, verbose = verbose): there is no package called 'survivalROC'
res = loonR::surv_ROC_DCA(mayo$mayoscore5, mayo$censor, mayo$time/30, timePoint = 24)
#> Error in loonR::surv_ROC_DCA(mayo$mayoscore5, mayo$censor, mayo$time/30,     timePoint = 24): object 'mayo' not found
res$ROC
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'res' not found
